metadata.name: Kingdom Island - #1
metadata.description: With the idea of developing a luxurious digital universe composed of dreams and fantasies, Exclusible has developed the next project in the Sandbox Game with an exotic, unique and tropical dimension! The Exclusible Private Islands are a set of 25 different special islands where the most exclusive members and VIPs of the community can enjoy and relax while experiencing gamified luxury in the metaverse space.
